attributes.action: Make Police threatening people however they like noticed and a sackable offence.
attributes.background: More than 30 complaints made regarding abuse from a police officer over 7 months. Police PSD won't do anything about it. Any excuse is made not to investigate the problem and allow their officers to get away with it. This needs to change and I need your help getting this recognised in Parliament.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you've made a complaint about the police, and you're not happy with the outcome, you may be able to appeal. You can find out more about that here: 

https://www.policeconduct.gov.uk/complaints-and-appeals/make-appeal

If you'd like a specific change to the way that all police complaints are handled, you could start a new petition about that. If you'd like our help writing a new petition, you can email us at petitionsteam@parliament.uk
